title: Installation issue: Petsc (Failed install of Metis)
body:
### Steps to reproduce the issue

Attempting to install `petsc`, but the install stage of `metis` fails. Installation steps:

```console
$ spack install petsc%gcc@8.2.0
```

### Information on your system

Output of `spack debug report`:

```console
* **Spack:** 0.15.4
* **Python:** 3.6.7
* **Platform:** linux-centos7-skylake
```

Output of `uname -a`:

```console
Linux borah-login 3.10.0-1160.24.1.el7.x86_64 #1 SMP Thu Apr 8 19:51:47 UTC 2021 x86_64 x86_64 x86_64 [GNU/Linux](url)
```

### Additional information

<!-- Please upload the following files. They should be present in the stage directory of the failing build. Also upload any config.log or similar file if one exists. -->
* [metis-spack-build-env.txt](https://github.com/spack/spack/files/6497306/spack-build-env.txt)
* [metis-spack-build-out.txt](https://github.com/spack/spack/files/6497307/spack-build-out.txt)

Maintainers: @balay @BarrySmith @jedbrown

### General information

The issue occurs during the install step of `metis`:

```console
==> Installing metis
==> No binary for metis found: installing from source
==> metis: Executing phase: 'install'
==> Error: ProcessError: Command exited with status 1:
    'cmake' '/tmp/dchipman/spack-stage/spack-stage-metis-5.1.0-pmgla5jgiecrgwklofi7okzdlxevzrwx/spack-src' '-G' 'Unix Makefiles' '-DCMAKE_INSTALL_PREFIX:STRING=/bsuhome/dchipman/packages/spack/opt/spack/linux-centos7-skylake/gcc-8.2.0/metis-5.1.0-pmgla5jgiecrgwklofi7okzdlxevzrwx' '-DCMAKE_BUILD_TYPE:STRING=Release' '-DCMAKE_VERBOSE_MAKEFILE:BOOL=ON' '-DCMAKE_INSTALL_RPATH_USE_LINK_PATH:BOOL=OFF' '-DCMAKE_INSTALL_RPATH:STRING=/bsuhome/dchipman/packages/spack/opt/spack/linux-centos7-skylake/gcc-8.2.0/metis-5.1.0-pmgla5jgiecrgwklofi7okzdlxevzrwx/lib;/bsuhome/dchipman/packages/spack/opt/spack/linux-centos7-skylake/gcc-8.2.0/metis-5.1.0-pmgla5jgiecrgwklofi7okzdlxevzrwx/lib64' '-DCMAKE_PREFIX_PATH:STRING=/cm/shared/apps/cmake/gcc/3.18.0' '-DGKLIB_PATH:PATH=/tmp/dchipman/spack-stage/spack-stage-metis-5.1.0-pmgla5jgiecrgwklofi7okzdlxevzrwx/spack-src/GKlib' '-DCMAKE_BUILD_TYPE:STRING=Release' '-DSHARED:BOOL=ON'
See build log for details:
  /tmp/dchipman/spack-stage/spack-stage-metis-5.1.0-pmgla5jgiecrgwklofi7okzdlxevzrwx/spack-build-out.txt
```

- [x] I have run `spack debug report` and reported the version of Spack/Python/Platform
- [x] I have run `spack maintainers <name-of-the-package>` and @mentioned any maintainers
- [x] I have uploaded the build log and environment files
- [x] I have searched the issues of this repo and believe this is not a duplicate
